TextView.android:text:
Don't spend time doing the same things again and again for every project that you start. 
Kickstart the devlopment by using this template. 
 
 Check out http://git.grit.im/android-reusable/AndroidKickstartTemplate 
 
Key features 
- gitignore to ignore build files etc already set up 
- variables in project's build.gradle to maintain same library versions across all modules 
- splash screen - just replace the splash.jpg image with your own branding 
- crash reporting using crashlytics already setup.. change the ApiKey with your own in the manifest. 
- some useful utils - explore the utils package. 
- app controller pattern implemented 
- push notifications using FCM ready to use (with minimal changes, read below) 
- MDM registration with GISynchro already set up - enable using a flag in AppConstants.java and replace the backend URLs in AppConstants.java
